items.sentence: Tom is looking for somebody to teach French to his children.
Tom is never going to be given the chance to do that, is he?
Tom is probably planning on staying in Boston until October.
Tom is rich enough to do just about anything he wants to do.
Tom is the only member of the baseball team that Mary knows.
Tom assumes Mary will be willing to help with the bake sale.
Tom ate the delicious meal and thought he must be in heaven.
Tom said he would be going to Boston on business next month.
Tom said that he had expected something different to happen.
If you want something done right, you should do it yourself.
